opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Bagley v. Board of Directors, Farmers National Bank

opinion:
537 U.S. 803

BAGLEY
v.
BOARD OF DIRECTORS, FARMERS NATIONAL BANK, ET AL.

No. 01-10793.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 7, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FIFTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and certiorari dismissed. See this Court's Rule 39.8. Reported below: 31 Fed. Appx. 152.
